creator: carl.dhalluin@ubizen.com
text:
I use apache 1.3.20 with tomcat 3.2.3.

Some simple requests trigger an ArrayOutOfBoundsException in 
org.apache.tomcat.util.URLUtil.normalizeURI.

GET //../ HTTP/1.0
GET http:// HTTP/1.0
GET https:// HTTP/1.0

The first one gives error on line 274, the other ones on line 222.

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
Fixed in 3.3. 

Low-priority for 3.2.x, if you have a patch please submit it ( and reopen the 
bug )
